Module com.gersonfaneto.yams
Package com.gersonfaneto.yams.controllers

Class StockController

java.lang.Object
com.gersonfaneto.yams.controllers.StockController
public abstract class StockController extends Object
Controller containing all the operations related with the Component and PurchaseOrder models on the System, such as creating, updating and retrieving information about them. Most of the operations relly on the CRUD operations accessed through the DAO.
See Also:
  • ComponentMemoryDAO
  • ComponentCRUD
  • Component
  • PurchaseOrderMemoryDAO

    • listComponents

      public static List<Component> listComponents(String componentType) throws ComponentTypeNotFoundException
      Retrieves all the Components in Stock the match the provided type.
      Parameters:
      componentType - The targeted Component type.
      Returns:
      The list of all the Components matching the provided type.
      Throws:
      ComponentTypeNotFoundException - If the componentType provided doesn't match any of the ones declared under the ComponentTypes enumeration.
      See Also:
      • Component
      • ComponentType

    • reserveComponent

      public static Component reserveComponent(String componentID)
      Searches for a Component given its ID and subtracts its amountInStock , indicating that its going to be used in a Service.
      Parameters:
      componentID - The ID of the desired Component.
      Returns:
      The desired Component.
      See Also:
      • Component

    • restoreComponent

      Returns a Component to the Stock and update its amountInStock.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The updated Component.

    • buyComponent

      public static PurchaseOrder buyComponent(String componentType, String componentDescription, double componentPrice, double componentCost, int boughtAmount) throws ComponentTypeNotFoundException
      Generates a new PurchaseOrder for a desired Component.
      Parameters:
      componentType - The type of the Component to be bought.
      componentDescription - The description of the Component.
      componentPrice - The price of each Component.
      componentCost - The cost of each Component.
      boughtAmount - The amount bought.
      Returns:
      A PurchaseOrder for the desired Component.
      Throws:
      ComponentTypeNotFoundException - If the componentType provided doesn't match any of the ones declared under the ComponentType enumeration.
      See Also:
      • PurchaseOrder
      • Component
      • ComponentType

    • storeBoughtComponents

      public static Component storeBoughtComponents(PurchaseOrder purchaseOrder)
      Process the information of a PurchaseOrder and creates/stores the Component referred by it.
      Parameters:
      purchaseOrder - The desired PurchaseOrder.
      Returns:
      The generated Component.
